query:
SELECT p.id, p.title, p.slug, p.order, 
       CASE WHEN p.content IS NULL THEN 'NULL' 
            WHEN LENGTH(p.content) = 0 THEN 'EMPTY' 
            ELSE CONCAT(LENGTH(p.content), ' chars') 
       END as content_status
FROM pages p
JOIN modules m ON p.moduleId = m.id
WHERE m.slug = 'subtracao'
ORDER BY p.order;
